p: Three commercial EOs extracted from medicinal plants were investigated. These EOs were bought from Laboratoires OMEGA Pharma (Groupe Perrigo)—Phytosun Arôms (Châtillon, France) and kept at 4 °C in dark glass bottles till used. These oils were extracted from twigs of R. officinalis L. (M14302), and from the aerial parts of flowering stage of T. zygis L. subsp. zygis (M13184) and O. majorana L. (74K100C6). These EOs were carefully chosen for their antibacterial and/or antibiofilm actions, as stated previously [ 11, 12, 13] and their usage in traditional medicine.
